mantikora.name: Possessed Mantikora
mantikora.description: First boss of SO. This snake will cast Popcorn which should be unstacked by dodge, Black hole which is basically a portal mechanic and Poison circles which is AoE

sets.why: You don't get any direct damage
You always just parse the boss
You are close to boss, so you get perfect zaan uptime
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn
Slayer + good AoE damage

no_sets.why: You don't get any direct damage except for popcorn phase

stonebreaker.name: Stonebreaker Troll
stonebreaker.description: Second boss of SO. This troll will throw stones and stomp, while there'll be adds casting lightning on you. Everything is healed, but lightnings should be unstacked

sets.why: Your group constantly gets AoE poison damage and sharing it one with other
You always just parse the boss
Due to lots of trash, stormfist AoE damage will be good
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn
Slayer + good AoE damage

ozara.name: Ozara Lamia
ozara.description: Third boss of SO. Does not have painful mechanics except for pins - synergy will free your teammate

sets.why: Your group constantly gets AoE poison damage and sharing it one with other
Due to lots of trash, stormfist AoE damage will be good
You always just parse the boss
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn
Slayer + good AoE damage

serpent.name: The Serpent
serpent.description: Last boss of SO. Has plenty of mechanics. Poison should be healed in stack, while other mechanic requires to stack into two different groups. Totems can either pull you from group or put a magicka bomb on you. Don't kill Mantikoras since they'll explode. On execute each player must grab a pink orb around the room. On HM Poison Field mechanics is added

sets.why: You don't get any direct damage and always close to the boss
You get constant damage, but no direct
You always just parse the boss
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn
Slayer + good AoE damage
